title: Personal Net-Negative Calculator
para1: Thank you for doing your part, this is your opportunity to pay it forward. Calculate how you can increase your goal to become net-negative
emissionsPlaceholder: Carbon footprint in tonnes per year
emissionsRegion: What region do you live in?
emissionsTimeHeader: How long do you want to be carbon neutral? (Years)
dataDisclaimer: This is only an estimate etc
nextPara: Calculate how many acres of Smart Forest you need to invest in to reach a Net-Zero emissions target.
otherbox1Para: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.
otherbox2Para: Calculate how much carbon your school must offset to reach net-zero.
otherbox3Para: Calculate how much carbon you must personally offset to reach net-zero.
plantforwardheader: Plant it forward to become net-negative
sharePersonalFacebook: I’m going #netNEGATIVE with @CanadasForest Trust to mitigate my impact on the climate. I’m doing my part, are you?
sharePersonalLinkedIn: Do you know what net-negative means? When it comes to the climate, it means planting it forward. I’ve calculated what I need to grow to become net-negative. Have you? Calculate your carbon footprint and go net-negative with @canadasforesttrust #CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests #ClimateChange
sharePersonalTwitter: I’m growing to #netNEGATIVE with @CanadasForest Trust to mitigate my impact on the climate. I’m doing my part, are you?
sharePersonalEmailSubject: Opportunity: Get Plant it Forward to Become Net-Negative
sharePersonalEmailBody: Did you know that forests are one of the most effective ways to sequester carbon and mitigate climate change? The research is clear and the need to combat our climate deficit is pressing. Canada’s Forest Trust has created a unique opportunity for me to offset my impact and plant it forward. How? By building or being part of a communal Smart Forest. Calculate your carbon footprint and get growing to net-negative.
shareSchoolFacebook: With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, [school name] has calculated our #carbon footprint. Click the link below to: 1) Calculate your carbon footprint 2) Start building your forest 3) Save the planet 4) Start a school fundraiser 5) Protect our future by growing to net-negative
shareSchoolLinkedIn: With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, [school name] has calculated our path to net-negative. Click to link below to: 1) Calculate yours carbon footprint 2) Calculate your net-negative targets 3) Start building your Smart Forest 4) Protect our planet and our future 5) Protect our planet and our future by growing to net-negative #CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests #EcoSchools #SmartForests
shareSchoolTwitter: With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, we’ve calculated our net-ZERO journey. But, that’s not enough. So, we’re growing to be net-negative! Are you?
shareSchoolEmailSubject: Plant it forward and become net-negative
shareSchoolEmailBody: The research is clear. An issue as threatening as climate change needs a solution as smart as forests. To make meaningful action against climate change, we are committed to become net-NEGATIVE with Canada’s Forest Trust. Click the link below to calculate your carbon footprint, start building your forest, save the planet and help your school by becoming net-negative.
shareCorpFacebook: [Company name] takes our ESG seriously. When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable. Using @CanadasForest Trusts proprietary calculator, we are building our Smart Forests to grow to net-negative. This is one of the most effective ways to combat climate change. Click the link below to calculate your carbon footprint and become net-negative with #CFT.
shareCorpLinkedIn: [Company name] has committed to plant it forward to take bold action against climate change. How? We’re growing to be net-NEGATIVE with @CanadasForestTrust. Learn how you can become net-negative with #CFT. #CanadasForestTrust #SmartForests #ClimateChange
shareCorpTwitter: Using @CanadasForest Trusts calculators, we’re building Smart Forests to become net-negative. This is one of the most effective ways to combat climate change. Click the link below to start calculating your carbon footprint and path to ne-negative.
shareCorpEmailBody: When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable. Using Canada’s Forest Trusts proprietary Carbon, net-ZERO and net-NEGATIVE Calculators, we are building Smart Forests to achieve our ESG goals and become net-NEGATIVE. Are you?
